posts.content:
Was hoping to get some help with a TWFing strength based kukri or shortsword ftr/rog/WM.

*crosses fingers and presses submit*

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Empyre, drop the last Great Dexterity and take Armor Skin, then use this last stat increase to end with 16 STR and 26 DEX for +2 AC or Epic Prowess for +1 AB.

Take it EZ!

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: That's a great idea! That is also why I said I'm not the best. I'm being too hard on myself. On another day, I might have seen that on my own.

posts.author: SolidusMath
posts.content: Thnk you sooo much, I really appreciate your time and the awesome build. When I build I lack the patience to wait till feats make sense in the build and take the good stuff asap. I also have a bad case of the "wants it all syndrome". It's such a relief to forget if the build is optimal, use whats written, and focus on the fun of RP. again thanks a ton.

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Empyre65 wrote:That's a great idea! That is also why I said I'm not the best. I'm being too hard on myself. On another day, I might have seen that on my own.
No need to be too hard on yourself. This game is so complex that I find myself constantly checking the wiki to review some things that I think I know to devise a new build, even though I have been playing the game for many many years. And fyi, I do the same thing all the time. I forget things, or don't see things. Usually what I do is I cough up a build, then let it marinate for a while in my head, then take a couple of fresh looks after some time has gone by and only then do I post them. Of course I'm talking about my builds here, if I build something per request, I normally don't double check it because I don't know the specific server info that is required in order to properly tweak a build. That is left for the OP to do when he sees potential weaknesses on the server he plays.

Take it EZ!

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content: You will gain +1 BAB/AB and +1 to reflex and will saves if you delay rogue (5) to level 21 and take fighter 9/wm 7/ rogue 4 pre epic. It will not influence your feat selection to take fighter (9) pre epic since you do not get any bonus feat at that level.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
That is yet another good idea. With that in mind, take WM straight through until you get the 7th level of WM at level 16, then take Rogue 4 at level 17. If you take Fighter 10 at level 21, you get Epic Weapon Spec as early as possible. That will require shuffling around when you take what skills.
